name: Amigo VR
description:
Many people have played Texas, but have you ever experienced Texas in virtual reality?

Would you like to immerse yourself in the most luxurious casinos in Las Vagas?

Would you like to play Texas with players from all over the world?

Would you like to have live chat with other players?

Would you like to triumph the Texas poker board?

Amigo VR have announced--"Texas Hold'em Poker", the world's most popular poker game.

In Amigo VR, you could lie on your cozy sofa at home, and enjoy an realistic, tense and exciting Texas.
